title: Untitled (Tempo Coperto)
inscriptions: on l.r. recto in paint: Afro./57; on verso canvas: "Tempo Coperto"; on verso, u.r. stretcher: per Jane e Andrew Ritchie; on verso, u.c. stretcher in pencil: PER ANDREW RITCHIE; on verso, u.c. stretcher in pen: "Tempo Coperto"; on verso, u.l. stretcher on label: Yale University/Art Gallery/ TR 5828/ Ritchie; on verso. u.l. stretcher on label: Afro; on verso stretcher in several places: 6
